scriptItem.label: Swatches Library
scriptItem.scriptCode: import hou x = hou.ui.curDesktop().createFloatingPaneTab(hou.paneTabType.PythonPanel, (200,200), (1200,800), "swatches") if x: x.floatingPanel().setName("swatches")

scriptItem.label: Asset Manager
scriptItem.scriptCode: import hou pane = hou.ui.curDesktop().createFloatingPaneTab(hou.paneTabType.PythonPanel, (300,300), (1200,700), "asset_manager") if pane: pane.floatingPanel().setName("Asset Manager")
